mapper.insert: insert into product_category (product_category_name, product_category_description, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, shop_id) VALUES (#{productCategoryName}, #{productCategoryDescription}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{shopId});
mapper.select: select product_category_id, product_category_name, product_category_description, priority, shop_id from product_category where shop_id = #{shopId} order by priority desc;
select product_category_id, product_category_name, product_category_description, priority, shop_id from product_category where product_category_id = #{productCategoryId};
